Text: fuckin awesome.  my first visit to this site was to find this flick.  thought it would never happen.
Great! The likes of Bunuel, Renoir and other quality art stuff is much appreciated here! :)
up untill now i only had a #dubbed# version... so never watched it. i thank you ohh so much.
up until "freakyflicks" on p.bay I had never even heard of Bunuel, thanks for the education juan delgado, and thanks again for the flicks
note the connection between the heroines name, Severine and the name of the protagonist in Leopold von Sacher-Masoch's classic "Venus in furs"...

to juan_delgado:
thx for the movie. can you upload another movies from luis buñuel ? Fantôme de la liberté, Le (1974); Charme discret de la bourgeoisie, Le (1972); Voie lactée, La (1969); Journal d'une femme de chambre, Le (1964); Un chien andalou (1929) ...
thx again
hey dosamantes, search FREAKYFLICKS and you should find lots of bunuel (kindly provided by juan + vickyz!)... unfortunately, no DIARY OF A CHAMBER MAID or La Voie lactée... yet!
hey..not yet but soon...im on holiday right now....
someone have this as a dvd rip?
